description: Model that represents the Safety Data Sheet document which is structured in 16 internationally agreed sections usually supplied via paper or digitally as PDF.

Text.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

Language.description: Describes a Property containing a language according to ISO 639-1, for example "de".

Alpha3CodeTrait.description: Constrainst the value to only three capital letters to represent the country code according to ISO 3166.

SDSCountryEntity.description: A country is a distinct territorial body or political entity.

alpha3Code.description: Country code consisting of three capital letters according to ISO 3166.

CountryTrait.description: Limits the set of countries to at least to one element.

IssueDateCharacteristic.description: Describes the date of the Property.

PreFormattedPayloadCharacteristic.description: Describes a Property which contains the Base64-encoded pre formatted payload representation of the Safety Data Sheet.

SafetyDataSheetPreFormattedEntity.description: Represents the information from a SDS based on already defined or standardized data formats ("pre-formatted"). Those data formats define the structure of the data and the corresponding data is referenced as "payload" information. For the SDS, the idea is to utilize the sdscom-xml format, while the payload data itself is included in a base64-encoded string. Nevertheless, other formats could be specified and utilized, too.

format.description: Identifier of the format of the payload.

formatVersion.description: Corresponding version identifier of the given format

preFormattedPayload.description: Base64-encoded string of data according to format

formatLink.description: URL to the format definition file

SafetyDataSheetLinkEntity.description: Allows referencing a SDS via a (publically available) URL.

PayloadCharacteristic.description: Describes a Property which contains the Base64-encoded payload representation of the Safety Data Sheet.

SafetyDataSheetBinaryEntity.description: Represents a base64 encoded SDS. The binary PDF file will be encoded by the binary-to-text encoding "Base64" which is common to be transported safely throughout systems that may only support text characters.

SafetyDataSheetAbstractEntity.description: Chemical products are supplied with a "Safety Data Sheet" (SDS) which is a document structured in 16 internationally agreed sections usually supplied via paper or digitally as PDF. A SDS lists information relating to occupational safety and health for the use of various substances and products.

issueVersion.description: Versioning information of the Safety Data Sheet

previousVersion.description: Versioning information of the previous SDS

applicableToCountry.description: Relationship between the Safety Data Sheet and the country to which it applies for.

issueDate.description: Issue date of Safety Data Sheet

SafetyDataSheetLinkList.description: Characteristic to describe the properties of the link representation of the Safety Data Sheet.

SafetyDataSheetBinaryList.description: Characteristic to describe the properties of the binary representation of the Safety Data Sheet.

SafetyDataSheetPreFormattedList.description: Characteristic to describe the properties of the pre formatted representation of the Safety Data Sheet.

safetyDataSheetLink.description: Property that references the link representation of the Safety Data Sheet.

safetyDataSheetBinary.description: Property that references the binary representation of the Safety Data Sheet.

safetyDataSheetPreFormatted.description: Property that references the pre formatted representation of the Safety Data Sheet.
